message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Status check on unified plan synthesis">
Status check â€” have you begun synthesizing the 10 plans into a unified proposal? You should have received plans from all 9 experts and translator-2. Once your unified plan is ready, broadcast it to all 10 team members for their feedback. Let me know if you're missing any submissions.
</teammate-message>

input.content: Already done. I synthesized all 10 plans plus my own into a unified proposal and broadcast it to all 11 teammates (9 experts + translator-2 + you) a moment ago. The proposal covers three parts: (1) three specific Preface edits with exact replacement text, (2) a detailed Afterword blueprint with five sections and word counts, and (3) a process plan for implementation. Now waiting for AGREE/DISAGREE/AMEND responses from the team.
input.summary: Unified proposal already broadcast, awaiting team responses

routing.summary: Unified proposal already broadcast, awaiting team responses
